notes.body: Hello Lokesh,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     This email is with reference to the concern raised for order #656572125272113152-30175.     We have received an update from our logistics team. As per the update, your order has been delivered on 09 December 2025,2:16 PM. Please accept my sincere apology for the inconvenience caused to you. We have shared the required feedback with the delivery agent and we will make sure that such instances are not repeated in the future.     Please consider this as a one-off instance as we aim to provide the best of services to our customers and such instances are very rare.     Since you are a valued customer, as a token of apology, we have credited Rs.30/- to your PharmEasy wallet on 07 December 2025.     We are marking the ticket as resolved. PharmEasy looks forward to bettering your experience in the future.     For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.      Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!     Regards,   PharmEasy
notes.body_html:
Hello Lokesh,

Greetings from PharmEasy!
 
This email is with reference to the concern raised for order #656572125272113152-30175.
 
We have received an update from our logistics team. As per the update, your order has been delivered on 09 December 2025,2:16 PM. Please accept my sincere apology for the inconvenience caused to you. We have shared the required feedback with the delivery agent and we will make sure that such instances are not repeated in the future.
 
Please consider this as a one-off instance as we aim to provide the best of services to our customers and such instances are very rare.

Since you are a valued customer, as a token of apology, we have credited Rs.30/- to your PharmEasy wallet on 07 December 2025.

We are marking the ticket as resolved. PharmEasy looks forward to bettering your experience in the future.

For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section. 
 
Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!

Regards, 
PharmEasy

helpdesk_ticket.description:
Dear Nodal Officer,

I am writing to urgently escalate a serious issue regarding my PharmEasy
order (Order ID: 656188529549578240), which contains two critical medicines
for my ailing parents. Despite paying in advance for express delivery, the
order has still not been delivered.

This order was promised to be delivered on Sunday 7th Dec, between 10:00 am
and 1:30 pm under the express delivery option, yet the delivery has not
taken place even now. This is extremely disappointing, especially when
additional fees have been collected on the assurance of faster and
time-bound delivery. Such failure to honour committed timelines defeats the
very purpose of express delivery and amounts to clear service deficiency.

These medicines are essential for my parents’ ongoing treatment, and any
delay directly affects their health and continuity of care. The stress of
repeatedly following up for something as basic as timely delivery of
life-critical medicines is both unfair and unacceptable.

Given the above, I request the following:
- Immediate dispatch and delivery of the complete order without any further
delay.
- A full refund of the express delivery charges collected for this order,
since the promised delivery window has been breached.
- A clear explanation of why such delays occur despite charging a premium
for express service, and what corrective steps PharmEasy is taking to
prevent recurrence.

If this matter is not resolved on priority and the medicines are not
delivered at the earliest, I will be compelled to escalate this issue to
the appropriate consumer grievance authorities and reconsider using
PharmEasy for future medical needs.

Please treat this as urgent and share a prompt resolution and clear
communication.

Warm Regards,
Avdhut Pure

--

This is extremely disappointing, especially when additional fees have been collected on the assurance of faster and time-bound delivery. Such failure to honour committed timelines defeats the very purpose of express delivery and amounts to clear service deficiency.  

These medicines are essential for my parents’ ongoing treatment, and any delay directly affects their health and continuity of care. The stress of repeatedly following up for something as basic as timely delivery of life-critical medicines is both unfair and unacceptable.  

Given the above, I request the following:  
- Immediate dispatch and delivery of the complete order without any further delay.  
- A full refund of the express delivery charges collected for this order, since the promised delivery window has been breached.  
- A clear explanation of why such delays occur despite charging a premium for express service, and what corrective steps PharmEasy is taking to prevent recurrence.  

If this matter is not resolved on priority and the medicines are not delivered at the earliest, I will be compelled to escalate this issue to the appropriate consumer grievance authorities and reconsider using PharmEasy for future medical needs.  

Please treat this as urgent and share a prompt resolution and clear communication.  

Warm Regards,  
Avdhut Pure

helpdesk_ticket.description:
Mr. Himanshu,

I had placed order 655483086539825152 on 4Dec, of which 6strips of D Code
60k were to be delivered by 6-7Dec.

Having waited until 9.15pm on 7 Dec, I went to track the whereabouts of
this order since I had been advised to take this by my doctor from 4th Dec.

However was shocked to see the order had been cancelled 3 days later
WITHOUT ANY NOTIFICATION, with reason cited as Out of Stock.

How can you accept orders if they are Not Available?
This is Not Grocery but Medicines and not the first time this is happening
where Medicine ordered is being Cancelled AFTER a couple of days which
DELAYS the start of treatment.

Which in this case, is losing me 4 days and possible another 1-2 days when
I try looking for it from tomorrow.

To make things worse, there is NO COMMUNICATION to notify about this
cancellation.
We keep getting rubbish publicity and promotion messages on SMS from
Pharmeasy including yesterday and today but
NO message for the medicine order being cancelled.

The number cited on your grievance process for level 1 support 8071324888
is coming across as INVALID (avaidhya number).

Want to understand what kind of service is being run here and that too in a
critical service like medicine??

A patient's life  might fall at risk because of this repeated callous
behaviour of accepting orders without sufficient inventory and
cancellations after few days and in this particular case, without even
notifying the cancellation via phone / sms.

Look forward to a satisfactory response before I escalate this further,
since this is quite concerning in a critical service field.

Regards

--

We tried calling you on the registered mobile number; however, we were unable to connect with you. 

We have received an update from our partner retailer that the item D CODE 60K ORANGE FLAVOUR SUGAR FREE STRIP OF 4 CHEWABLE TABLETS is currently unavailable and will be marked as out of stock shortly.

With regards to your order #656248831703515136-43250, as checked due to some unforeseen circumstances, the order was not delivered to you by the expected date of delivery. notes.body_html:
Hello Sriramalingam,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

With regards to your order #656248831703515136-43250, as checked due to some unforeseen circumstances, the order was not delivered to you by the expected date of delivery. Please accept my apologies for the same.

As per the records, your order is delivered to you on 08th December 2025. We have jotted down the details of your experience and PharmEasy will ensure all appropriate actions are taken to prevent similar situations from happening in the future.

As a token of apology, we have already credited Rs.30/- to your PharmEasy wallet.

We look forward to having an opportunity to serve you in the future.

We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.

For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.

PharmEasy

helpdesk_ticket.description:
I am writing to report a very concerning experience with my recent
consultation.

My initial consultation was scheduled for 9:30 PM. The doctor joined, but
we spoke for barely 4–5 minutes. During the call, the doctor herself said,
“Upload the image and I will give you the correct prescription.” I told her
I could not see any option to upload my image and asked how to do it. She
replied that she cannot help and that I should “call customer care.”

I contacted Customer Care immediately, but before I could upload anything,
the doctor had already issued a prescription in a hurry and marked the
consultation as complete — even though I told her I recently had an
endoscopy and cannot tolerate strong painkillers or heavy antibiotics.
Despite this, she still prescribed medication unsuitable for my condition.

Customer Care then informed me that images can only be uploaded after a
consultation is marked complete, and advised me to book a follow-up
consultation, which is free for 7 days. I booked the follow-up within 10
minutes, at 10:00 PM, and uploaded the images right away. The
representative also confirmed that my issue was clearly visible in the
pictures and assured me that the doctor would likely adjust the
prescription after reviewing them.

However, during the follow-up consultation, the doctor did not join the
call at all, yet marked it as completed without speaking to me or reviewing
the uploaded images. This left me with no clarification, no updated
prescription, and no guidance, despite paying a significant amount for
proper medical advice.

Given the seriousness of my symptoms and my medical limitations due to
recent endoscopy findings, this experience has caused unnecessary stress
and has not provided the care I was promised.

I request that this issue be addressed urgently, and that either:
• A new consultation be arranged with a different doctor, OR
• My uploaded images and medical history be reviewed properly for an
accurate and safe treatment plan.

Thank you for your prompt attention.

Warm regards,
Hershey

--

helpdesk_ticket.subject: Urgent Issue: Consultation Incomplete + Follow-up Marked Done Without Call
helpdesk_ticket.description_html:
I am writing to report a very concerning experience with my recent consultation.

My initial consultation was scheduled for 9:30 PM. The doctor joined, but we spoke for barely 4–5 minutes. During the call, the doctor herself said, “Upload the image and I will give you the correct prescription.” I told her I could not see any option to upload my image and asked how to do it. She replied that she cannot help and that I should “call customer care.”

I contacted Customer Care immediately, but before I could upload anything, the doctor had already issued a prescription in a hurry and marked the consultation as complete — even though I told her I recently had an endoscopy and cannot tolerate strong painkillers or heavy antibiotics. Despite this, she still prescribed medication unsuitable for my condition.

Customer Care then informed me that images can only be uploaded after a consultation is marked complete, and advised me to book a follow-up consultation, which is free for 7 days. I booked the follow-up within 10 minutes, at 10:00 PM, and uploaded the images right away. The representative also confirmed that my issue was clearly visible in the pictures and assured me that the doctor would likely adjust the prescription after reviewing them.

However, during the follow-up consultation, the doctor did not join the call at all, yet marked it as completed without speaking to me or reviewing the uploaded images. This left me with no clarification, no updated prescription, and no guidance, despite paying a significant amount for proper medical advice.

Given the seriousness of my symptoms and my medical limitations due to recent endoscopy findings, this experience has caused unnecessary stress and has not provided the care I was promised.

I request that this issue be addressed urgently, and that either:
• A new consultation be arranged with a different doctor, OR
• My uploaded images and medical history be reviewed properly for an accurate and safe treatment plan.

Thank you for your prompt attention.

Warm regards,
Hershey

notes.body: Hello Mohit,     Greetings from PharmEasy!  ​   With regards to your order #656508602827440128-87500, I see a return request is already raised for the medicine ​OSMEGA 500MG STRIP OF 30 CAPSULES. Please accept my sincere apologies for the inconvenience caused.   As per the records, the medicines are picked up on 07th December 2025. Once the medicine is returned, it will be verified by our partner retailer at the store. The refund will be processed and initiated within 48 hours. Also, once the refund is initiated it would reflect in your payment source in 5 to 7 business days.       As a token of apology, we have credited Rs. 50 to your PharmEasy wallet.   I appreciate your patience in the meantime.  ​   For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.     Regards,  Manisha
notes.body_html:
Hello Mohit,

Greetings from PharmEasy!
​
With regards to your order #656508602827440128-87500, I see a return request is already raised for the medicine ​OSMEGA 500MG STRIP OF 30 CAPSULES. Please accept my sincere apologies for the inconvenience caused.

As per the records, the medicines are picked up on 07th December 2025. Once the medicine is returned, it will be verified by our partner retailer at the store. The refund will be processed and initiated within 48 hours. Also, once the refund is initiated it would reflect in your payment source in 5 to 7 business days. 

 As a token of apology, we have credited Rs. 50 to your PharmEasy wallet.

I appreciate your patience in the meantime.
​
For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.

Regards,
Manisha

notes.body: Hello Sandip,      Greetings from PharmEasy!     With regards to your order #653935449986310144-44794, I am sorry to know you have not received your ordered medicine VIBITE M 500MG STRIP OF 15 TABLETS of 2 quantities. This is certainly not the kind of experience that we wanted you to have with our services. I apologize for the inconvenience caused to you.     I have highlighted the issue to our partner retailer. The issue is being investigated; this will take 24-48 hours from the time of reporting the issue. Once the issue is verified, we will try to initiate a refund for the missing medicines. We will inform you of the status once we receive an update from our partner retailer.     Once the refund is initiated, it will reflect in your payment source within 5-7 working days. Also, please confirm whether the order was delivered in intact condition.     Please be informed that we are unable to open the images that you have sent us. I would kindly request that you share the images in JPG or PDF format.     I appreciate your patience in the meantime.     Regards,  Sandhya Nackwal
notes.body_html:
Hello Sandip,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

With regards to your order #653935449986310144-44794, I am sorry to know you have not received your ordered medicine VIBITE M 500MG STRIP OF 15 TABLETS of 2 quantities. This is certainly not the kind of experience that we wanted you to have with our services. I apologize for the inconvenience caused to you.

I have highlighted the issue to our partner retailer. The issue is being investigated; this will take 24-48 hours from the time of reporting the issue. Once the issue is verified, we will try to initiate a refund for the missing medicines. We will inform you of the status once we receive an update from our partner retailer.

Once the refund is initiated, it will reflect in your payment source within 5-7 working days. Also, please confirm whether the order was delivered in intact condition.

Please be informed that we are unable to open the images that you have sent us. I would kindly request that you share the images in JPG or PDF format.

I appreciate your patience in the meantime.

Regards,
Sandhya Nackwal

Have a great day ahead!     Regards,  PharmEasy

notes.body: Hello Ashish,     Greetings from PharmEasy!          I apologise for the miscommunication that was sent in the previous email.   I understand your concern regarding the order #656526610945835008-83563. Please accept my sincere apologies for the inconvenience caused, and I will surely assist you with the same.  As per the records, the medicine ACNE UV ADVANCED LIGHT PROTECTION SPF 30+ PA++++ SUNSCREEN GEL 60 GM was picked up on 09th December 2025, and it has been verified by our partner retailer at the store on 10th December 2025.    I see the refund of Rs. 614.46 was initiated on 10th December 2025. It will be credited to your original payment source within 5 to 7 working days from the date of initiation. You can track your refund via ARN number: 534402396141.     Please note: Saturday, Sunday, and public holidays will not be included in business days. Refund timelines depend on Bank turnaround times.      Please be informed that we are currently unable to offer a replacement for the medicine or product, as this facility is not available.     We have jotted down the details of your experience, and PharmEasy will ensure all appropriate actions are taken to prevent similar situations from happening in the future.     I appreciate your patience and understanding in the meantime.     For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the Need Help section. Alternatively, you can also call us on 08071324888.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay healthy!     Regards,  Habiba

I can see the requested product has been returned and a refund of Rs. 614.46 was initiated to your payment source on 10th December 2025. ​
I am sorry to inform you that your order #655909447583170560-88292 was cancelled because the area selected in your order is currently unserviceable. I can understand how upsetting this must be for you. I am sorry for the inconvenience caused to you.
​
The refund amount of Rs. 3050.40 was initiated on 07th December 2025, and it will be reflected in your payment source account within 5 to 7 business days (Excluding Saturday, Sunday & Bank Holidays). Request you to check with your bank's customer care with the help of the ARN number (​534104009372).

Please be informed, your pin code is serviceable, however, your area location is out of our serviceable area. You may place a new order with an alternate address and we will process it accordingly. 

I appreciate your patience and understanding in this regard.

notes.body: Hello Nisha,     Greetings from PharmEasy!      With regards to your order #655283076458262528-85361, I see the requested medicine ERAFLEX STRIP OF 10 TABLETS was unavailable with our partner retailer.      Please note, at the time of placing the order, the requested medicine was available in limited quantity, and you were able to add medicines to the order. Once the medicine was added to your order, our Partner Retailer tried to arrange the medicine from every possible source.     However, they could not arrange one. I apologize that we were unable to fulfil your medicine requirements for this order completely.     I request you to place a new order after 7 days for the required medicine. As our retailer restocks the medicines every 7 days. If the medicine is still unavailable, I would request that you reach out to us. We will highlight your concern to the Partner retailer.     For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the Need Help section. Alternatively, you can also call us on 8071324888.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!     Regards,  Tahera

helpdesk_ticket.description:
Hello Mr. Himanshu.
    I placed my order on 1st December, this is my  order ID
 654401049951518720. It consists of important asthma medicine for my dad..
while placing the order it showing ETA 3-4 days trusting that I went
through order & verified with pharmeasy online doctor and told me your
order would be dispatched soon..

I waited 2 days ...but still order wasn't dispatched.i reached out to
customer care they said order would be delivered before 7 December. I
requested them i need meds urgently..in my previous order I got by 3-4 days
...but they have given me ridiculous reason like we are still processing
the order.. then on the 4 th December your team dispatched the order... I
couldn't believe 4 days for just collecting medicine and sending. Again I
asked to expedite the order but no..same scripted msg ..sir you would get
on 7 December.

 Now today on 7th day when I tracked the order it was showing it has
reached to delevery hub in morning 8:57 am and courier team was shiprocket
(in past really poor experience with them).. so I was hopeful for today..
waiting the whole afternoon and evening ...I wasn't given NO contact number
of courier team & partner so I could contact them ...but as expected no
delevery attempt was made for the whole day..so again I contact the
customer support but same msg deliver to your address before 10 pm
today...  Then I had but NO option but went to courier office (12 km) away
from delivery location... When I asked them u guys have pharmeasy parcel
with you .. please could you help me ...they instantly said no.. we don't
keep pharmeasy just 1mg only....but i again requested them , then they
checked..
   And guess what I was right..the parcel was with them only... But they
been such lazy & unprofessional...they didn't open any bags today from
morning 9am .  I begged them ..i would open the bags and can take the
parcel as I am at the office...and explained them ..it is for my dad
required for asthma... The sheer attitude...they told me ..you wouldn't get
your parcel today...will deliver to you Tommorow...
 That's absolutely absurd... WAITING 8 DAYS FOR MEDICINE THAT ALSO
PREPAID..AND REQUESTED TO YOUR TEAM AND EVERY ONE , HOW URGENT THAT WAS
...  But again I had to face the disappointment ..I mean what we as
customer gonna do ... facing the dadagiri of courier partners ...  Your
team has given me date 4-7 December and you guys failed that... Then what
are consequences... I mean. I damn sure no action (as always happens) taken
against anyone...
   I was detached again called customer care ..they told me you would get
your parcel today before 10 pm ..i explained delevery team is not even
giving me parcel while I'm at there office.. standing for 30 mins..told me
forget your delivery today..will attempt Tommorow.
Initially ur team told the same scripted msg again then after holding for
many minutes they have raised the ticket..then i asked ...as a token of
apology from your end... could i buy emergency meds for 1 day ..so your
team could credit/ reimburse that ...they said no...then i asked what would
the endgame of this ticket generated? They told me ...u would get your
product in 24-48 hours...so In short..I was big fool who again trusted
pharmeasy... waiting 9-10 days to receive my order... I could have walked
to Mumbai and still it wouldn't have taken me 10 days...
 I don't know what you gonna do Mr. Himanshu..you gonna take some
action...or as token of apology provide me with some credits for the
trouble & mental stress i went through...or ignore... As frustrated son
..who is waiting for his Old dad's medicine maybe or maybe not u would
understand.... that's my grievance .

-- 


Disclaimer:

This email contains proprietary, business-confidential, 
and/or privileged material. The information contained in this e-mail is 
intended solely for the use of the individual to whom it is addressed. If 
you are not the intended recipient, you are hereby notified that any 
disclosure, copying, distribution or action in relation to the contents of 
this email is strictly prohibited and may be unlawful and request you to 
permanently delete this message and any attachments herein. You are 
requested to advise the sender, of your receipt of this email by return 
e-mail. The Company and its affiliates rule out any and every liability 
resulting from this or any other electronic transmission.

notes.body: Hello Alfiya Mansuri,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     With regards to your order #653103968582082560-40833, as checked the return request is already raised for medicine from your order. As per the records, the medicines are picked up on 8th December, 2025.     As the medicine has been returned, it will be verified by our partner retailer at the store. The refund will be processed and initiated within 24-48 hrs post verification. Also once the refund is initiated it would reflect in your pe wallet (refund cash) within next 24-48 hrs.     We appreciate your patience in the meantime.     We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.     For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels, on the App or website, listed in the "Need Help" section.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!     Regards,  PharmEasy
notes.body_html:
Hello Alfiya Mansuri,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

With regards to your order #653103968582082560-40833, as checked the return request is already raised for medicine from your order. As per the records, the medicines are picked up on 8th December, 2025.

As the medicine has been returned, it will be verified by our partner retailer at the store. The refund will be processed and initiated within 24-48 hrs post verification. Also once the refund is initiated it would reflect in your pe wallet (refund cash) within next 24-48 hrs.

We appreciate your patience in the meantime.

We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.

For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels, on the App or website, listed in the "Need Help" section.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!

Regards,
PharmEasy
